positiveCases.title: Verify Number Input Accepts Valid Number
steps: Enter dynamic number into the Number input field
positiveCases.expectedResult: Number input displays the entered number
positiveCases.checkpoint: Validate that the displayed value matches the entered number

positiveCases.title: Verify Text Input Accepts Valid Text
steps: Enter dynamic text into the Text input field
positiveCases.expectedResult: Text input displays the entered text
positiveCases.checkpoint: Confirm the displayed text matches the input

positiveCases.title: Verify Password Input Masks Characters
steps: Enter dynamic password into the Password input field
positiveCases.expectedResult: Password field masks input (dots or asterisks)
positiveCases.checkpoint: Ensure masking is applied and input is stored correctly

positiveCases.title: Verify Date Input Accepts Valid Date
steps: Enter valid date (dd/mm/yyyy) or select from calendar
positiveCases.expectedResult: Date input displays the entered date
positiveCases.checkpoint: Validate correct date format and value

positiveCases.title: Verify Clear Inputs Button Clears All Fields
steps: Fill all input fields with valid data
positiveCases.expectedResult: All fields are reset to empty
positiveCases.checkpoint: Confirm all input fields are cleared

negativeCases.title: Enter Alphabetic Characters in Number Field
steps: Enter alphabetic characters into the Number input field
negativeCases.checkpoint: Validate that non-numeric input is not accepted

negativeCases.title: Leave Required Fields Blank
negativeCases.checkpoint: Ensure system handles empty inputs gracefully

negativeCases.title: Enter Invalid Date Format
steps: Enter date in wrong format (e.g., yyyy-mm-dd)
negativeCases.expectedResult: Error or rejection due to incorrect format

negativeCases.title: Enter Special Characters in Text Field
steps: Enter special characters into the Text input field

edgeCases.title: Enter Maximum Length Text
steps: Enter a long string (e.g., 255 characters) into the Text field
edgeCases.checkpoint: Validate max length handling and display

edgeCases.title: Enter Zero in Number Field
steps: Enter 0 into the Number input field
edgeCases.checkpoint: Confirm zero is treated as valid input

edgeCases.title: Enter Future Date Beyond Current Year
steps: Enter a future date (e.g., 01/01/2100) into the Date field

edgeCases.title: Rapid Input and Clear Sequence
edgeCases.checkpoint: Confirm UI responsiveness and no crash
